entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
